title: Menu Item Nutrition Label Widget
description: Visualize a menu item's nutritional label information as HTML including CSS.

defaultCss.Name: defaultCss
defaultCss.Description: Whether the default CSS should be added to the response.

showIngredients.Name: showIngredients
showIngredients.Description: Whether to show a list of ingredients.

quota: Calling this endpoint requires 1 point. Learn more about quotas.
